code: export var SET_ENGINE="SET_ENGINE";export var SET_COLOR="SET_COLOR";export var SET_INTERIOR="SET_INTERIOR";export var SET_WHEEL="SET_WHEEL";export var SET_EXTRAS="SET_EXTRAS";export var CALCULATE_PRICE="CALCULATE_PRICE";export var SET_MODEL="SET_MODEL";export var selectEngine=function selectEngine(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_ENGINE,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};export var selectModel=function selectModel(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_MODEL,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};export var selectColor=function selectColor(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_COLOR,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};export var selectInterior=function selectInterior(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_INTERIOR,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};export var selectExtras=function selectExtras(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_EXTRAS,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};export var selectWheel=function selectWheel(option){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_WHEEL,payload:option});dispatch({type:CALCULATE_PRICE});};};
